name: Hamburger
description: A Hamburger with one beef patty, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A cheese Burger with one beef patty, a slice of cheddar cheese, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Double Double
description: A cheese Burger with two beef patties, a slice of cheddar cheese, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A Burger with one chicken patty, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Aussie Burger
description: A cheese Burger with one beef patty, a slice of cheddar cheese, beetroot, eggs, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Bacon & Egg Roll
description: A roll with crispy bacon and fried eggs.

name: Chicken & Cheese Burger
description: A cheese Burger with one chicken patty, a slice of cheddar cheese, tomato sauce, onions, lettuce and tomato.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: If you want to see these nuggets you have to buy them and see the suprise!

name: Onion Rings
description: A basket of perfectly battered, light onion rings.

name: Salad
description: A garden salad for people who want salad for some reason.

name: Ice Cream
description: A choice of vanilla, matcha, chocolate, strawberry, caramel or sesame ice cream.

name: Soft Drink
description: A choice of Coke, Fanta, Solo or Passiona.

name: Coffee
description: For the people who like roasted bean water.

name: Beer
description: A pint of VB for your hard earned thirst!
